display_long_description:
🎮 Funky Fitness Meets Rhythm Combat!

Vibe Punch is a VR rhythm-action game where you strike down incoming projectiles in sync with high-energy music.
In a neon-lit arena, you’ll physically move to the beat—punching, dodging, and chaining combos to boost your score.
It’s rhythm, reaction, and raw energy in one immersive experience.
[media]

▶ Key Features


🥊 Rhythm-based punching combat with intense, fast-paced action

🎵 30 original tracks composed exclusively for Vibe Punch

🎨 Stylish dynamic spaces that react to punch

📀 Custom Album Mode – Create your own playlist from the full soundtrack

🙌 No-Fail Mode! Enjoy every track to the end without pressure

💡 Striking neon visuals and satisfying haptic feedback


Experience a thrilling VR game where every punch triggers responsive visuals and sound.
Dive into the soundscape and punch to the rhythm!
